Hyderabad vs Rajasthan

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”800px” max_width_tablet=”800px” max_width_phone=”800px” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”25px||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mark your calendars for Hyderabad vs Rajasthan! If we talk about the performance trajectory, both teams are strong, and both have won the Indian T20 League trophy once. However, if we compare both teams, Hyderabad has the upper hand as it has reached the playoffs six times and has a well-balanced team compared to Rajasthan.

The teams have played 15 matches against each other, in which Hyderabad has charted eight wins while Rajasthan has commandeered seven matches. Both teams are quite strong and have made smart acquisitions. However, this time Hyderabad looks quite promising in the Indian Cricket League as the squad is a perfect blend of experience and enthusiasm.

Hyderabad vs Rajasthan Head-to-Head Record

The Hyderabad and Rajasthan teams have faced each other 15 times in the Indian Cricket League. The Hyderabad team has won 8 times, whereas the Rajasthan team has won 7 times.

Know more about Hyderabad and Rajasthan teams in the Indian T20 Cricket League

Hyderabad Team If we talk about consistency, Hyderabad is the team. This team has a clear vision and does not mend the squad by signing new players every season. Hyderabad won the cup in 2016 and has been one of the most promising teams. They were runners-up in 2018, and out of nine seasons, Hyderabad has reached the playoffs six times. This time, the franchise bought 20 players. Some of the key players who got picked are Washington Sundar, Nicholas Pooran, T Natarajan, and Bhuvneshwar Kumar. Nicholas Pooran was the team’s top pick at Rs.10.75 crores. Rajasthan Team Rajasthan won the inaugural match in 2008 under the mentorship of Shane Warne, and ever since then, fans have been eagerly waiting for the team to perform to its fullest potential. Rajasthan has always depended on overseas players like Jos Buttler and Ben Stokes. This has not proved favourable for the team. However, this season, the franchise has retained only three players, Sanju Samuel, Jos Buttler, and Yashaswi Jaiswal. Hopefully, things will be brighter for the team this time.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ Top Performers in Batting – Hyderabad vs Rajasthan Matches

The top run-getters in Hyderabad vs Rajasthan matches are:[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_4_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#FC575E” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Most Runs

Sanju Samson from Team Rajasthan has successfully amassed 382 runs, followed by Ajinkya Rahane with 347, who plays for Rajasthan. Third on the list is Hyderabad skipper Shikhar Dhawan, with 253 runs. Sanju Samson should be one of the picks in your Indian T20 Premier Fantasy League, as he has scored a century against Hyderabad and is in great form this season. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Roster” _builder_version=”4.14.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#121a25″ background_color_gradient_end=”#002e54″ background_image=”http://www.my11circle.com/fantasy-sports/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/cricket-icon-04.png” background_size=”contain” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_3_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#fc575e” header_3_font_size=”28px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Top Performers in Bowling – Hyderabad vs Rajasthan Matches

The bowlers with the most wickets in Hyderabad vs Rajasthan matches are:[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_4_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#FC575E” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Most Wickets

James Faulkner from Team Rajasthan is a left-arm fast-medium bowler and an outstanding wicket-taker with 12 wickets. Team Hyderabad’s right-arm fast-medium bowler Bhuvaneshwar Kumar follows Faulkner with nine wickets, and third on the list is Dale Steyn from Team Hyderabad, with eight wickets. If you are rooting for Hyderabad, top-order players like Kane Williamson, Washington Sundar, Nicholas Pooran and Bhuvaneshwar Kumar should be in your team.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0C101B” background_color_gradient_start=”#002e54″ background_color_gradient_end=”#121a25″ background_image=”http://www.my11circle.com/fantasy-sports/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/esports-icon-2-4.png” background_size=”initial” background_blend=”overlay” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” header_3_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#fc575e” header_3_font_size=”24px” header_3_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tips For Picking Your Fantasy Team

Creating the perfect fantasy team requires good analytical skills and in-depth know-how of the sport. Before creating your team and choosing the players, do the following:
  • Gather information about player statistics to understand and analyse the player’s past performances.
  • Select the captain and vice-captain carefully.
  • Choose top-order batsmen to increase your chances of winning.
  • Don’t put all your eggs in one basket; create multiple teams to increase your chances of winning.
  • Finalise the team at the last moment. Be ready with your team before the game begins but do not finalise it. Be patient, wait for the toss, and understand the final lineup to ensure that nothing stops you from winning.
